statements: DELETE FROM Location WHERE name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Location WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM Location WHERE country = 'Japan' AND city = 'Tokyo';
DELETE FROM ar_objects WHERE name = 'Table' AND location_id IN (SELECT id FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 40.0);
DELETE FROM landmarks WHERE landmark_name = 'Statue of Liberty';
DELETE FROM users WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40);
DELETE FROM Ratings WHERE user_id = 1 AND location_id = 3;
DELETE FROM check_ins WHERE user_id = 2002 AND place_id = 3003 AND checkin_time < '2022-01-01';
